database.name: VIEW OEZ_REQUISITION_TRACEBILITY_V
database.view: SELECT a.m_requisitionline_id AS oez_requisition_tracebility_v_id, a.ad_client_id, a.ad_org_id, a.isactive, a.created, a.createdby, a.updated, a.updatedby, j.name AS requestor, c.documentno, a.line, b.value, b.name, a.qty AS qtypr, a.reqstatus AS statuspr, a.pricelist, d.qty AS qtyorder, l.value AS bpcode, l.name AS bpname, e.pricelist AS orderpricelist, e.priceactual AS orderpirceactual, e.linenetamt AS orderlinenetamt, a.qty - d.qty AS pendingpr, f.documentno AS purchaseorderno, k.order_min AS mrp_moq, k.order_pack AS mrp_orderpack, k.costperorder AS mrp_cosperorder, k.qtystd AS mrp_qtystd, h.documentno AS documengr, g.movementqty AS qtygr, g.movementqty - d.qty AS pendinggr, i.value AS namagudang FROM m_requisitionline a LEFT JOIN m_product b ON b.m_product_id = a.m_product_id LEFT JOIN m_requisition c ON a.m_requisition_id = c.m_requisition_id LEFT JOIN m_requisitionorder d ON d.m_requisitionline_id = a.m_requisitionline_id LEFT JOIN c_orderline e ON e.c_orderline_id = d.c_orderline_id LEFT JOIN c_order f ON f.c_order_id = e.c_order_id LEFT JOIN m_inoutline g ON e.c_orderline_id = g.c_orderline_id LEFT JOIN m_inout h ON h.m_inout_id = g.m_inout_id LEFT JOIN m_locator i ON g.m_locator_id = i.m_locator_id LEFT JOIN ad_user j ON j.ad_user_id = c.ad_user_id LEFT JOIN m_product_po k ON k.m_product_id = b.m_product_id LEFT JOIN c_bpartner l ON l.c_bpartner_id = e.c_bpartner_id WHERE f.issotrx = 'N'
